page.title: 09Callington Shops
page.content:
Hindles is a newsagent which sells{ {cards, stationary}and{tobbaco.}If you go down there on a Sunday it will be packed because people want their Sunday paper.{Hindles}is in between a pub and an estate agents in{Fore {Street.}You can ask for your paper to be delivered. 5 people work there. It is about 5-10 years old.
Callington Spar is a very good and busy shop. It sells{delicatessen} vegetables and other foods. They sell videos and a few{clothes.}They sell toilet things and bathroom equipment.
The shop is quite big and they have Smartened their{butchery counter.}The shop opens from eight am to nine pm and there are twelve people who work there.
